posts.post_content:
My guess for why this was reprinted instead of [Day of Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgment) is that there's a 4-mana sweeper in RTR and Wizards didn't want sweepers.dec.  
  
Eight 4-mana sweepers and [Terminus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terminus) sounds brutal for aggro.

posts.post_content:
What is it about Wrath cards and having the same general art? see [Day of Judgement](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Day of Judgement) [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) [Damnation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Damnation).  
I get that it's all supposed to bring the iconic WoG to mind, but seriously, big ball of light, dissolving silhouettes, even the positioning of it all is basically the same. Great card though, and I guess it's pretty good to have one effect have an iconic image.
posts.html:

I get that it's all supposed to bring the iconic WoG to mind, but seriously, big ball of light, dissolving silhouettes, even the positioning of it all is basically the same. Great card though, and I guess it's pretty good to have one effect have an iconic image.

I can see it all now...
  
   
[omniscience](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=omniscience), [worldfire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=worldfire), this card, [faith's reward](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=faith's reward) ... [gilded lotus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=gilded lotus) and [infernal plunge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=infernal plunge) perhaps...
  
   
SInce they're reprinting awesome cards, I hope we see [obliterate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=obliterate) again... Nevermind, they're reducing board wiping by like two mana already... Just gave it 3 (W) to try and balance it somehow? Zzz
  
   
Also some flavor text would be nice... This and murder make me sad...
